name: play mario
description:
part of a super secret secret santa ritual. made in twine for Mut. similar in vibe to YOU AREN'T MARIO.

if you don't have sound, you might have to die & come back. idk what to tell you, internet browsers are just like that.

music:

  • "Arcadia Town," Windows 96
  • "Night City," Dirty Beaches
  • "I Can't Surf," The Reverend Horton Heat
